                     ca.bankonit.models.Account account)

        Initializes the account window and displays transactions
        Parameters:
        bankManager - BankManager to manage bankManager object
        account - Account to manage account object
        Throws:
        ca.bankonit.exceptions.InvalidAccountException - thrown when no matching account number provided
